name: Caribbean Invaders
description:
We strongly recommend to DOWNLOAD the game (links are below this text)!

Game description

One sunny day in rescaria you decided to take a boat trip on the sea. Unluckily after a few miles you sail broke and you were no longer able to take your way back. Yo are now floating **deeper and deeper** out into the sea Lonely on the said boat - only having a cannon and two oars to ba able to move small distances - you encounter various dangerous situations.

Try to survive as long as possible.

# Technical stuff

This shoot-em-up typed game contains 29 different levels, and switches to an endless-like mode after solving wave 29.

  • You can **control your ship** by using WASD, arrow Keys or the left stick of any controller.
  • To **fire** your cannon, use Space, Right Control or Return key - A button or RT/RB on a controller.
  • You can additionally **change pan and tilt angles** of your cannon using your mouse /horizontally = pan) and mouse wheel (tilt) or the right stick on a controller.

Game Description

Try no to collide with reefs, enemies, gunpowder barrels (gray) or - obviously - cannon balls ;)

  • Try to collect repair barrels (brown)
  • Try not to die

It's as simple as...

Got it? Have fun!
And don't forget to submit your score and put the wave you failed into the comments.

Cheats

Failing too much? Wave too hard? We made some cheats for debugging purposes...

  • You can Press F7 to kill ALL enemies at once
  • Use F8 to enable god mode but beware: it can't be disabled anymore.

Using any cheat - of course - prevents you from submitting your highscore though.
